name: Dress up kson!
description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY, BOSS:

Dress-up your own kson! 22nd birthday celebration project for ksonONAIR!
ksonに着せ替えよう！ksonONAIR２２歳お誕生日記念プロジェクト

Please consider sharing your doll on Twitter with the tag #KSONDOLL so everyone may see it!
完成したら #KSONDOLLでツイートして、みんなに見せよう!!!


CREDITS: Our Muse
